pointcloud_sweep_aggregator.cpp

5 
6 /* \brief pointcloud sweep aggregator node to produce a single pointcloud per radar revolution */
7 
8 
9 #include <ros/ros.h>
10 #include <ros/console.h>
11 
12 #include <pcl_ros/point_cloud.h>
13 #include <pcl/filters/passthrough.h>
14 
15 #include <auvlab_msgs/RadarSpoke.h>
16 #include <auvlab_msgs/RadarSegment.h>
17 #include <iostream>
18 
19 #define SPOKES_IN_SEGMENT 32
20 #define PIXELS_IN_SPOKE 512
21 
22 using namespace std;
23 using namespace pcl;
24 
25 // globals
26 float check_angle = 0.0;
27 typedef PointXYZI PointType;
28 
29 PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr cloud_ptr(new PointCloud<PointType>);
30 
31 ros::Publisher _pub_cloud_aggregate;
32 
33 void segments_to_pcl_cb(auvlab_msgs::RadarSegment segment)
34 {
35 
36  for(int spoke=0; spoke<segment.spokes.size(); spoke++)
37  {
38 
39  float add = (segment.spokes[spoke].angle - check_angle);
40  if (add < 0.0)
41  add = 360 - add;
42  check_angle += add;
43  if(check_angle < 360.0)
44  {
45  float angle = segment.spokes[spoke].angle - 270; // correct for orientation forward
46  float max_range = segment.spokes[spoke].max_range;
47 
48  for(int bin=0; bin<PIXELS_IN_SPOKE; bin++)
49  {
50  PointType p;
51  p.x = max_range * bin/(PIXELS_IN_SPOKE-1) * sin(angle * M_PI/180.0);
52  p.y = max_range * bin/(PIXELS_IN_SPOKE-1) * cos(angle * M_PI/180.0);
53  p.z = 0.0;
54  p.intensity = segment.spokes[spoke].data[bin];
55  cloud_ptr->push_back(p);
56  }
57  } // end if check for 0.0 angle
58  else
59  {
60  check_angle = 0.0; // reset angle check
61  // filter data to remove zero intensity points
62  PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr cloud_filtered_ptr(new PointCloud<PointType>);
63  PassThrough<PointType> pass;
64  pass.setInputCloud(cloud_ptr);
65  pass.setFilterFieldName("intensity");
66  pass.setFilterLimits(1.0, FLT_MAX);
67  pass.filter(*cloud_filtered_ptr);
68 
69  // convert to ros msg
70  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 cloud_msg;
71  toROSMsg(*cloud_filtered_ptr, cloud_msg);
72  cloud_msg.header.stamp = segment.header.stamp;
73  cloud_msg.header.frame_id = "velodyne"; // TODO: Change to rader with parameter
74 
75  // publish radar sweep
76  _pub_cloud_aggregate.publish(cloud_msg);
77 
78  // clear cloud_ptr
79  cloud_ptr->clear();
80  }
81  }
82 
83 } // end segments_to_pcl_cb
84 
85 int main(int argc, char **argv)
86 {
87  // init ros
88  ros::init (argc, argv, "aggregator");
89  ros::NodeHandle nh;
90  ros::NodeHandle private_nh("~");
91 
92  _pub_cloud_aggregate = nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>("/broadband_radar/channel_0/pointcloud/revolution", 1000);
93 
94  // init parameters
95  string _segment;
96  if ( private_nh.getParam("segment_topic", _segment))
97  {
98  ROS_INFO("segment_topic: %s", _segment.c_str());
99  }
100  else
101  {
102  ROS_INFO("no segment topic set, defaulting to /broadband_radar/channel_0/segment");
103  _segment = "/broadband_radar/channel_0/segment";
104  }
105 
106  // Subscribe to the segment topic 'segment'
107  ros::Subscriber sub = nh.subscribe(_segment, 1000, segments_to_pcl_cb);
108 
109  // Spin
110  ros::spin();
111 
112 }
